TEXT.English: Hello [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the wonderful Equestrian Empire. I'm always glad to make all sorts of new friends, and I can't wait for you to meet my other buddies too! I look forward to a harmonious and overall GOOD time with you in the future...
Sorry [CT_NAME], but I don't want to talk to you right now. Your past behavior has shown me that you are not as trustworthy as you would appear. It's okay, I understand you've made your decision.
I won't agree to any peace treaty right now, [CT_NAME]. You won't get away from me that easily!
Very good, [CT_NAME]. I knew I could count on you to do the right thing. Our civilizations will go grow closer together in these peaceful times!
Hello [CT_NAME]. Is there anything I can do for you, my friend?
[CT_NAME], what a shock... Things must be serious, if you are coming to me for help! What could you possibly want this time?
With these nuclear weapons, I will reign supreme over those stuffy Canterlot nobles! How do you like me now, [CT_NAME]?
[CT_NAME], my friend, might I ask for your assistance at this important time? Sharing is caring, you know...
[CT_NAME], certainly you'll be able to assist us in our crucial situation? You know it's the right thing to do...
[CT_NAME], my friend, will you be able to provide assistance to us at this crucial time? You are quite important to us as an ally, you know...
[CT_NAME], my friend, will you be able to provide assistance to us at this crucial time? You are quite important to us as an ally, you know!
CT_NAME], my friend, might I ask for your assistance at this important time? Sharing is caring, you know, and I am sure you care a lot, right?
[CT_NAME], certainly you'll be able to assist us in our critical situation? It's the right thing to do, you know!
[CT_NAME], my friend, might I be able to offer assistance to your smaller civilization? Sharing is caring, you know!
[CT_NAME], certainly we'll be able to assist you in this crucial situation? If you really need this, we will be glad to ally ourselves with you...
[CT_NAME], my friend, may I provide assistance to you at this crucial time? You are quite important to us as an ally, you know...
Very well, [CT_NAME]. This is the best offer I can think of at the moment. Will you take it?
[CT_NAME], are you ready to put this conflict behind us and accept a peace treaty?
[CT_NAME], I believe a trade deal will be very good for us both. Would you be willing to accept this generous proposal?
[CT_NAME], I would like to inform you that I intend to cancel this deal. I see no further reason why this deal should continue, unless you have other plans...
You have disappointed me for the last time, [CT_NAME]. Bad behavior like yours will not be tolerated any longer! ([OUR_NAME] declares war!)
